												            Treatment Options for Adult Soft Tissue Sarcoma
												            
												                
												                    Stage I Adult Soft Tissue Sarcoma
												                    Treatment of stage I soft tissue sarcoma may include the following:         -  Surgery to remove the tumor, such as Mohs microsurgery for small sarcomas of the skin, wide local excision, or limb-sparing surgery.
